content: /=Another Valka enters the room. She looks concerned for the barely conscious Dusi and mortified by Juno.=/
[bolverk] "After I kill you, Yngvar, I'll rip their bodies apart. I'll pull this arrow and--"
/=Bolverk looks at you and his eyes go wide before a cold hatred settles into his stare.=/
/=Bolverk growls deeply and stands to his full height, brandishing his axes. He looks stronger than ever.=/
[bolverk] "I'm going to fix that. I'll kill her! And you! And him! I'll pull out this damn arrow and--"
[bolverk iver] "We know you murdered Raze. And her child."

content.option: Step forward and draw your weapon
"Why in the depths is Bellower's body here?"
"And I know you've lost your damn mind."

content: [bolverk] "I've seen things from the other side. The dredge lives warped and ruined by the two you stand with."
/=Bolverk points past you to Eyvind.=/
[bolverk] "She's supposed to be dead - killed by her own!"
/=Bolverk's rage is consuming him and he is spitting more than speaking.=/
[bolverk] "They lay waste to everything they're near!"
[bolverk] "Those of us forced below! We who are already paying for /=his =/crime!"
[bolverk] "We know you murdered Raze. And her child."
[bolverk] "/=You lied to us! Your oaths meant nothing!=/"
[bolverk] "You won't do anything again! I'll pull you apart. I'll kill Eyvind and Yngvar. I'll pull out this arrow and--"
/=Eyvind reacts to her by screaming, and the whole tower pulses with crackling energy, shaking violently.=/
[iver] "Is that Bellower's faen body?!"
[juno] "Bolverk...I can--"
[juno] "He was supposed to--"
[juno] "Iver, I'll help Eyvind and hold off Dusi."
[juno] "Kill Bolverk! You're the only one who can!"
[juno] "No!"
[juno] "Not just his body, I fear. Bolverk's mind is...not his own."
[juno] "No, Zefr! Now, you will do as /=I=/ say!"
/=The fear in her voice is infinite.=/
/=The floor and walls are now glowing, floating, and breaking apart.=/
/=The Valka Zefr looks shocked by Juno's control, but you waste no time in charging Bolverk. =/
{skip} mark1=iver mark2=bolverk mark3=juno mark4=zefr
/=You slam your head into him with tremendous force, sending him reeling across the room.=/
/=You step forward, but feel the air thicken around you for a moment, stopping you. Then, it suddenly releases its grip.=/
[zefr] "Stay where you are, Yngvar!"
